channel.title: 554 base
channel.description:
Hi, many people asked me for equiping and such, so im going to release a little base for 554, Sicne there no other base. Features: Equiping Unequip Drop Item Pickup Working bonus Object click 1 Food eating only sharks, easy to add more. Death at 0 hp Event Manager Package is kinda different at the pali's one atm. Weapon with their interface and name on it BASIC COMBAT ( PLAYER VS PLAYER ) There is alot of bug to fix, but you can find them yourself they are all fixable :)
credits: 100% me
Server Download Link:[url=http://uppit.com/v/M7X6AWEB]http://uppit.com/v/M7X6AWEB[/url]
Client:[url=http://uppit.com/v/CV8D78TL]http://uppit.com/v/CV8D78TL[/url]
Cache(in your C drive): [url=http://uppit.com/v/D4C1HTR3]http://uppit.com/v/D4C1HTR3[/url]
A little fix: To make player stop attacking when other is dead and facing player in combat lol : in combat.java under:
Code: Player enemy = Engine.players[player.attackPlayer];
add:
if(player.skillLvl[3] <= 0 || enemy.skillLvl[3] <= 0) { player.getMovement().requestFaceTo(65535); resetAttack(player); } if (player.faceToReq != (32768 + player.attackPlayer)) { player.getMovement().requestFaceTo(32768 + player.attackPlayer); }

item.title: 554 base
item.dc:creator: @tack3rs tack3rs
item.description:
@tack3rs wrote:

Hi, many people asked me for equiping and such, so im going to release a little base for 554, Sicne there no other base.
Features:
Equiping
Unequip
Drop Item
Pickup
Working bonus
Object click 1
Food eating only sharks, easy to add more.
Death at 0 hp
Event Manager
Package is kinda different at the pali’s one atm.
Weapon with their interface and name on it
BASIC COMBAT ( PLAYER VS PLAYER )
There is alot of bug to fix, but you can find them yourself they are all fixable

credits: 100% me

Server Download Link:http://uppit.com/v/M7X6AWEB

Client:http://uppit.com/v/CV8D78TL

Cache(in your C drive): http://uppit.com/v/D4C1HTR3

A little fix:
To make player stop attacking when other is dead and facing player in combat lol :
in combat.java
under:

Code:
Player enemy = Engine.players[player.attackPlayer];

add:

if(player.skillLvl[3] <= 0 || enemy.skillLvl[3] <= 0) {
player.getMovement().requestFaceTo(65535);
resetAttack(player);
}
if (player.faceToReq != (32768 + player.attackPlayer)) {
player.getMovement().requestFaceTo(32768 + player.attackPlayer);
}

Read full topic
